data.text: Muxun nan n na,
A n gbɛngbɛn nɛn a yɛɛ ra,
A luma a sɛnbɛn nakelɛ n tan xili ma waxatin birin!
A bata n fatin nun n fati kidin mafasa,
A bata n nabilin xɔlɛn nun ɲaxankatane ra feu!
A bata n lu dimini,
Ala bata n nabilin yinna ra,
Hali n xinla ti n mali feen na han,
A bata kiraan bolon n yɛɛ ra gɛmɛ fɛrɛnne ra,
Ala luxi nɛn n xa
a yi n ba kiraan xɔn,
A bata a xanla bandun
A xalimakunle bata n gbingin sɔxɔn.
N bata findi magele seen na n ma yamaan birin xa,
Ala bata n nalugo sansi xɔlɛne ra,
A bata n karahan
A bata n ba bɔɲɛ xunbenli,
N yi fa a fala, n naxa,
N ma ɲaxankatana fe xa rabira i ma,
N na n miri ne ma,
Koni miriyani ito nan fa n bɔɲɛni
Alatalaa hinanna mi ɲanma,
Ala mɔn xɛtɛma e ma xɔtɔn yo xɔtɔn.
N na a falama nɛn n bɔɲɛni,
Alatala fan muxun na,
A lan muxun xa Alatalaa kisin mamɛ maraxarani.
A lan adamadiin xa xuru tɔrɔyaan bun
Xa Ala a ragidi a ma,
a yi a xinbi sin a yɛtagi burunburunni.
A xa a dɛɛn ti a bɔnbɔ muxun xa,
Amasɔtɔ, Marigin mi a mɛma adamadiine ra han habadan.
Hali a tɔrɔn nafa e ma,
Alaa ɲɛnigen mi a ra,
Xa muxune yamanan kasorasane birin yibutuxun,
xa kiti kɛndɛn mi sama adamadiin xa
xa kitisane mi tin muxun xun mayɛngɛ kitin sɛ,
Nde nɔɛ fena nde falɛ,
Gbalon nun hɛrin firinna birin mi fataxi
Nayi, xa muxun bata yulubine liga,
En na en sigati kiine rakɔrɔsi,
En Ala maxandi en bɔɲɛn ma feu,
Yamaan yi Ala maxandi, e naxa,
“I bata i yɛtɛ rabilin xɔlɔn na
I bata i yɛtɛ luxun kundani
I bata nxu lu
“Nxu yaxune birin dɛni bixi nxu xili ma han!
Fe magaxuxine nun yili gexine nan tun nxu yɛɛ ra,
N yɛɛn xɔnna bata rafe yɛɛgen na
N yɛɛgen minima
han Alatala yi a yɛɛ ragodo n ma
N yɛɛne n xɔlɔma
Naxanye n yaxuyama fuyan,
E bata n ɲɛɲɛn nagodo yili tilinxin na,
Igen yi sa n xun ma,
Alatala, n na i xili nɛn yili tilinxin kui.
I bata n gbelegbele xuiin mɛ,
N to i xili, i yi i maso n na
Marigina, i bata n xun mayɛngɛ kitini,
Alatala, i bata a to,
I bata a to,
Alatala, i bata e konbi ti xuine mɛ,
e falan tima n xili ma,
E mato, e nɛma dɔxi,
Alatala, e kɛwanle saran e ra,
E bɔɲɛne raxɔdɔxɔ ayi,
Alatala, e sagatan i ya xɔlɔni
